text: 14.15: 1 Ko 8.11-13Maaŋ muuŋgiap, guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma the khaŋ ndɨkndɨgar bigɨn then muunga, kha bigɨn, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨme nɨman nzaŋnzaŋgi. Ndu ana nɨman mba bigɨna pi. Ndu guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma ndɨkndɨgar farfagi. Ndu maaŋ muuŋv ndu kaŋgiri, ndu ndavar guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma ga ndɨɨi fhu. Ndu kaŋgiri, Krais, ana taagip mba guma ndir zav, ana nzuav rimgi. Ndu mba ana farfagi bigɨna mbɨ thari.
